items.content_html: Worker-webserver is a lightweight NPM package that allows you to implement a web server in your service worker using the fetch event. It allows you to intercept incoming requests, match them with a user-defined router, and execute a series of middleware functions to handle them.
items.title: lulusir/worker-webserver: Worker-webserver is a lightweight NPM package that allows you to implement a web server in your service worker using the fetch event. It allows you to intercept incoming requests, match them with a user-defined router, and execute a series of middleware functions to handle them.
